label: Bedding and Linens
description: Market category for bedding and linens, including sheets, pillowcases, and duvet covers.
intents: Find bedding for specific bed sizes

subcategories.label: Sheet Sets
subcategories.description: Sets of fitted and flat sheets for different bed sizes.

subcategories.label: Pillowcases
subcategories.description: Cases for pillows in different sizes and materials.

subcategories.label: Duvet Covers
subcategories.description: Covers for duvets in different sizes and materials.

subcategories.label: Valances
subcategories.description: Decorative covers for the base of beds.
